title: Why can't my phone open some images, audio clips, or videos?
answer:
l   Your phone may not support the file format.

Supported image formats include PNG, GIF, JPG, and BMP. Supported video and audio formats include MP3, WAV, OGG, MID, AMR, MPEG-4, and 3GP.

For files in other formats, you may need to use third-party applications.

l   The file may have corrupted.

Download another copy of the file and try opening it again.

l   The file may be copyright-protected.

Obtain a non copyright-protected version of the file.

l   The battery level may be low.

Connect your phone to a charger and try again.

l   Unknown error may have occurred.

Restart the applications in question or your phone.
